data.comment: There are 8000 people in the crowd for today's match.
The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in Hoffenheim.
In the minute 2, Manuel Grafe signals a Hoffenheim throw-in in Frankfurt's half.
Goal kick for Hoffenheim at Commerzbank Arena.
Andre Silva of Frankfurt smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Frankfurt at Commerzbank Arena.
Hoffenheim needs to be cautious. Frankfurt have an attacking throw-in.
Hoffenheim awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 7, Can Frankfurt get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hoffenheim's half?
Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
Hoffenheim to take a throw-in in Frankfurt territory.
In the minute 9, Hoffenheim have a goal kick.
Free kick for Hoffenheim in their own half.
Hoffenheim awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 11, Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Frankfurt.
Andre Silva (Frankfurt) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Frankfurt are caught offside.
In the minute 12, Frankfurt's Andre Silva breaks free at Commerzbank Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Hoffenheim goal kick.
Manuel Grafe awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 14, Ball safe as Hoffenheim is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Hoffenheim in their own half.
Daichi Kamada of Frankfurt is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 15, Free kick Hoffenheim.
Throw-in for Frankfurt in their own half.
Hoffenheim awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 18, Goal! Andrej Kramaric gives Hoffenheim a 0-1 lead.
Great play from Christoph Baumgartner to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Frankfurt in the half of Hoffenheim.
In the minute 21, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Hoffenheim get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Frankfurt's half?
Throw-in Hoffenheim.
In the minute 24, Manuel Grafe signals a throw-in for Frankfurt, close to Hoffenheim's area.
Frankfurt are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Frankfurt drive forward but Daichi Kamada is judged offside.
In the minute 28, Andrej Kramaric for the away team is judged to be offside.
In Frankfurt a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Manuel Grafe awards Frankfurt a goal kick.
In the minute 31, It's a goal kick for the away team in Frankfurt.
Andre Silva for Frankfurt is whistled offside.
Andrej Kramaric gets his shot on target but fails to score for Hoffenheim.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
Hoffenheim are in shooting range from this free kick.
Sebastian Rode (Frankfurt) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 36, Hoffenheim awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Manuel Grafe.
Hoffenheim push forward at Commerzbank Arena and Dennis Geiger gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Frankfurt defence.
In the minute 38, Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Manuel Grafe.
Andrej Kramaric of Hoffenheim gets in a strike, but is off target.
Frankfurt have a goal kick.
In the minute 40, It's a goal kick for the away team in Frankfurt.
Frankfurt's Almamy Toure has run offside.
Free kick for Frankfurt in the half of Hoffenheim.
In the minute 41, Dennis Geiger for Hoffenheim has been booked by Manuel Grafe and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Frankfurt at Commerzbank Arena.
Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
In the minute 43, Frankfurt push forward at Commerzbank Arena and Martin Hinteregger gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Hoffenheim defence.
Throw-in for Frankfurt close to the penalty box.
Almamy Toure of Frankfurt is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 45, Hoffenheim are pushing forward but Robert Skov's finish is wide of the goal.
Manuel Grafe awards Frankfurt a goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Frankfurt is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
Frankfurt's Andre Silva misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 47, Ball goes out of play for a Hoffenheim goal kick.
Manuel Grafe awards the home team a throw-in.
In Frankfurt a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 48, Manuel Grafe signals a Frankfurt throw-in in Hoffenheim's half.
Frankfurt's Almamy Toure gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Hoffenheim at Commerzbank Arena.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Frankfurt in their own half.
Throw-in for Frankfurt at Commerzbank Arena.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim in the half of Frankfurt.
In the minute 51, Hoffenheim have a dangerous throw-in.
Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
Steven Zuber (Frankfurt) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 53, Frankfurt to take a throw-in in Hoffenheim territory.
Goal! Daichi Kamada levels the match at 1-1.
Bas Dost instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 57, Hoffenheim awarded a free kick in their own half.
Manuel Grafe awards the home team a throw-in.
At Commerzbank Arena, Florian Grillitsch has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 58, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Frankfurt's Andre Silva gets in a shot on goal at Commerzbank Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ball goes out of play for a Frankfurt goal kick.
In the minute 61, Frankfurt awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Frankfurt in the half of Hoffenheim.
Goal kick for Hoffenheim at Commerzbank Arena.
Can Frankfurt capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hoffenheim's half?
In the minute 63, Frankfurt make their first substitution with Tuta replacing David Abraham.
Free kick for Frankfurt in their own half.
In the minute 65, Manuel Grafe signals a Frankfurt throw-in in Hoffenheim's half.
Frankfurt's Bas Dost is on target but unsuccessful.
Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Manuel Grafe.
In the minute 66, Andre Silva (Frankfurt) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Manuel Grafe awards Hoffenheim a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
In the minute 71, Bas Dost scores to make it 2-1 at Commerzbank Arena.
That's a fine assist from Andre Silva.
Sebastian Hoeness is making the team's second substitution at Commerzbank Arena with Ihlas Bebou replacing Robert Skov.
In the minute 73, In Frankfurt Hoffenheim drive forward through Stefan Posch. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Manuel Grafe.
The away team have replaced Dennis Geiger with Mijat Gacinovic. This is the first substitution made today by Sebastian Hoeness.
In the minute 74, Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Manuel Grafe.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Hoffenheim is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
Frankfurt have a goal kick.
Free kick for Hoffenheim in their own half.
In the minute 77, Ishak Belfodil is on a sub for Christoph Baumgartner for Hoffenheim.
Frankfurt push upfield but Manuel Grafe quickly pulls them for offside.
Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Manuel Grafe.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Frankfurt.
Frankfurt's Andre Silva is whistled for offside at Commerzbank Arena.
In the minute 81, Ragnar Ache is replacing Bas Dost for Frankfurt at Commerzbank Arena.
In the minute 83, Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Frankfurt.
Stefan Posch is booked for the away team.
Throw-in high up the field for Frankfurt in Frankfurt.
In the minute 84, Hoffenheim have a goal kick.
Throw-in Hoffenheim.
Hoffenheim awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Frankfurt in their own half.
Throw-in for Frankfurt in their own half.
The home team replace Daichi Kamada with Timothy Chandler.
In the minute 87, Adi Hutter (Frankfurt) is making a fourth substitution, with Aymen Barkok replacing Steven Zuber.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim in their own half.
Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
In the minute 89, Hoffenheim awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim at Commerzbank Arena.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Manuel Grafe awards the away team a throw-in.
Hoffenheim are coming forward and Andrej Kramaric gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Frankfurt at Commerzbank Arena.
Frankfurt have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Hoffenheim.
Aymen Barkok of Frankfurt gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Hoffenheim goal kick.
Can Hoffenheim get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Frankfurt's half?
Munas Dabbur (Hoffenheim) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Manuel Grafe signals a throw-in for Hoffenheim, close to Frankfurt's area.
Full-time! The final score is 2-1.
